context.arch.widget
Class WidgetXML

java.lang.Object
  context.arch.widget.WidgetXML

public class WidgetXML
extends java.lang.Object

Stub class to generate Widget from an XML declaration. Can also generate widget stubs in the form of ComponentDescription to be used to generate QueryItems for subscribing to the widget.

getWidgetSubscriptionQuery

public static AbstractQueryItem<?,?> getWidgetSubscriptionQuery(Widget widget)

getWidgetSubscriptionQuery

public static AbstractQueryItem<?,?> getWidgetSubscriptionQuery(ComponentDescription widgetStub)
Gets a subcription query based on the name of the widget, and constant attribute values. The specified values help select the widget of interest

Parameters:
widgetStub - a minimal description of the widget containing its name, id (maybe; but buggy now), and limited constant attributes with values.
Returns:
an ANDQueryItem of multiple conditions to be satisfied to find this widget to subscribe to

getWidget

public static Widget getWidget(java.lang.String filename)
Very basic widget with no explicit ID constant attribute values being set. The ID is set by the timestamp of creation.

extractConstantAttValues

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Comparable<?>> extractConstantAttValues(Widget widget)
Convenience method to extract constant attribute values from a Widget. These would then be used to fill in values for XML generation of widgets or enactors.

Parameters:
widget -
Returns:
